song.title: Ninakuhitaji
song.englishTitle: Blessed Lord, How Much I Need Thee!

verses.verse: Bwana ninakuhitaji! Ni mpofu, maskini; Unishike mkononi, Kwako napata nguvu.
verses.refrain: Kila saa, Kila saa Bwana ninakuhitaji; Kila saa, Kila saa, Unilinde kila saa.
verses.verse: Univike na mavazi Ya usikivu wako; Nguo zangu ni machafu, Nazitamani zako.
Wewe ukiniongoza Nitakwenda salama; Nenda nami siku zote, U nuru na uzima.
Na ikiwa m-beleni Sehemu yangu ngumu, Au ikiwa furaha, Unilinde kila saa.
